Show / Hide Table of Contents

Namespace PacManBot.Games

Classes

BaseGame

The base all games inherit from. Implements IBaseGame.

Board<T>

Wrapper for a 2D array that introduces index looping, and allows access using Pos coordinates.

ChannelGame

A type of game that takes place in a specific channel. Implements IChannelGame.

MultiplayerGame

A specialized type of game that is channel-based and allows for inter-player mechanics as well as AI. Implements IMultiplayerGame.

Instances of its subclasses must be created using CreateNew<TGame>(UInt64, SocketUser[], IServiceProvider).

Structs

Player

Represents the index of the user in a IMultiplayerGame. Acts as a wrapper for System.Int32, like an enum.

Pos

A position in a Board<T>, expressed as x and y coordinates.

Interfaces

IBaseGame

The interface all games derive from.

IChannelGame

The interface for channel-specific games, giving access to channel, guild and message members.

IMessagesGame

The interface for IChannelGames that receive message input.

IMultiplayerGame

The interface for multiplayer games, giving access to player and AI members.

IReactionsGame

The interface for IChannelGames that receive reaction input.

IStoreableGame

Identifies a game type as storeable, allowing calls to and automatically deserializing stored instances that match the FilenameKey on start-up.

IUserGame

The interface for user-specific games. Has prevalence over IChannelGame when sorting between the two.

Enums

Dir

The four cardinal directions, useful with Pos and extension methods.

State

Indicates whether a game is ongoing, or why it ended.
